Topic / Concept: Hoisting (var/let/const, function declarations vs expressions, TDZ)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; understand whyvarhoists toundefinedvsletthrows ReferenceError. Common puzzle questions.

Topic / Concept: Lexical scope, scope chain, global vs local scope
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; be able to trace variable lookups through nested functions. Foundation for closures.

Topic / Concept: Closures (definition, practical patterns, memory implications)
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; implement: once(), memoize(), private state, module pattern. Very common interview scenarios.

Topic / Concept: thisbinding (default, implicit, explicit with call/apply/bind,new, arrow functions)
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; practice: method on object vs global context vs constructor vs arrow in method. Common puzzle questions.

Topic / Concept: Event loop, call stack, task queue, microtask queue (promises vs timers)
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; trace execution order in complex async scenarios. Do 3–5 ordering puzzles (promise + setTimeout combinations).

Topic / Concept: Prototype chain,__proto__,Object.create, inheritance
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; understand prototype lookup, whyArray.prototype.pushis accessible on array instances. Contrast with class syntax.

Topic / Concept: Constructor functions,newkeyword mechanics
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; understand: creates new object, sets prototype, bindsthis, returns object. Compare to class constructors.

Topic / Concept: ES6classsyntax,extends,super, inheritance patterns
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5–2 hours; syntactic sugar over prototypes; understand super() calls and method overriding.

Topic / Concept: Promises: states (pending, resolved, rejected), chaining,.then/.catch/.finally
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; implement: error propagation,Promise.all/race/allSettled/any, and common pitfalls (promise.then().catch() doesn't catch outer promise).

Topic / Concept: async/await: syntax, error handling, parallel vs sequential awaits
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; practice: converting promise chains to async/await, error handling with try/catch, await in loops (performance implications).

Topic / Concept: Microtask ordering (promises in microtask queue vs setTimeout in macrotask queue)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–2 hours; trace execution: setTimeout vs promise.then() vs queueMicrotask(). Do 4–5 ordering puzzles.

Topic / Concept: Generators (function*,yield), iteration, generator delegation
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; conceptual understanding sufficient; rarely asked in depth, but useful for understanding async/await internally.

Topic / Concept: varvsletvsconst, block scoping, temporal dead zone (TDZ)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand block scope in loops (for(let i) behaves differently than for(var i)).

Topic / Concept: Value vs reference types (primitives vs objects), copying semantics
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand why{a:1} === {a:1}is false butlet x = {a:1}; let y = x; y === xis true.

Topic / Concept: Deep clone vs shallow copy patterns,Object.assign, spread operator
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5–2 hours; implement: JSON.parse/stringify method, recursive clone, nested object scenarios.

Topic / Concept: Array methods (map, filter, reduce, find, some, every, flat, flatMap)
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; use in 10+ algorithm scenarios; understand time complexity and common pitfalls.

Topic / Concept: Destructuring (arrays, objects, nested, rest patterns)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; practice extracting values in function params and variable assignments.

Topic / Concept: Rest/spread operator (...) in arrays, objects, function params
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand difference in function params (rest) vs literals (spread).

Topic / Concept: Arrow functions, lexicalthis, implicit return, when NOT to use arrow functions
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; practice: method on object (use regular function, not arrow), constructor (use regular function).

Topic / Concept: Function declarations vs expressions, named function expressions
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand hoisting differences and when to use each.

Topic / Concept: Default parameters, parameter validation patterns
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; edge cases:undefinedvsnullvs falsy values triggering defaults.

Topic / Concept: call,apply,bindmethods (explicitthisbinding)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5–2 hours; practice: borrowing methods (Array.prototype.slice.call), partial application with bind.

Topic / Concept: Object property descriptors,Object.defineProperty, getters/setters
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; understanding:enumerable,configurable,writable, custom getters/setters logic.

Topic / Concept: typeofvsinstanceof, checking types accurately (object, array, null edge cases)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand:typeof null === 'object', whyinstanceofchecks prototype chain.

Topic / Concept: DOM basics (query, create, update, remove, append, text vs innerHTML)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; XSS pitfall with innerHTML; use textContent for text, innerHTML for safe HTML.

Topic / Concept: Event propagation (capturing, bubbling, target vs currentTarget),stopPropagation,preventDefault
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5–2 hours; practice: event delegation, understanding phase, preventing defaults (form submission, clicks).

Topic / Concept: addEventListeneroptions (capture, once, passive), event object
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand when to use capture phase vs bubbling; passive for scroll performance.

Topic / Concept: Debounce & throttle implementation patterns
Time Estimate + Notes: 2–3 hours; implement both from scratch, understand tradeoffs, use cases (search, resize, scroll).

Topic / Concept: setTimeout,setInterval, clearing timers (clearTimeout,clearInterval)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand: millisecond precision isn't guaranteed, relation to event loop.

Topic / Concept: try/catch/finallywith async (async/await error handling)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; practice: catching promise rejections, async function errors, finally for cleanup.

Topic / Concept: Custom errors, error propagation in async chains
Time Estimate + Notes: 1–1.5 hours; creating custom error classes, re-throwing, distinguishing error types.

Topic / Concept: JSON.parse/JSON.stringify, limitations (functions, Dates, circular references)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand: replacer/reviver params, Map/Set not serializable, deep clone with JSON method.

Topic / Concept: Modules: ES modules (import/export), CommonJS (require/module.exports)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5–2 hours; understand: static vs dynamic imports, default vs named exports, circular dependency edge cases.

Topic / Concept: Strict mode ('use strict'), impact onthis, eval, function calls
Time Estimate + Notes: 30 mins; understand: disables implicit globals, saferthisbinding, generally good to enable.

Topic / Concept: Polyfills & transpilation basics (Babel, what's converted from ES6+ to ES5)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; conceptual understanding sufficient for interviews.

Topic / Concept: Symbol, Map, Set basics (when to use vs plain objects/arrays)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; understand: Symbol for unique keys, Map for key-value with non-string keys, Set for unique values.

Topic / Concept: WeakMap, WeakSet (memory, garbage collection)
Time Estimate + Notes: 30 mins; conceptual only; rarely used in typical apps.

Topic / Concept: Proxy & Reflect (meta-programming)
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5 hours; advanced; only if you enjoy deep JS.

Topic / Concept: thisin classes, method binding in React/callbacks
Time Estimate + Notes: 1.5–2 hours; understand:thisin class methods, arrow methods vs regular methods, common pitfalls in React.

Topic / Concept: Template literals, tagged template functions
Time Estimate + Notes: 1 hour; nice syntax feature, tagged templates are rarely asked.
